section.heading: Application for initial license.
section.text: A nurse staffing agency shall submit to the Department, as part of the agency’s initial application for licensure:

para.text: The business name of the agency;
The addresses of the agency’s registered business office, operations headquarters, and District of Columbia operations headquarters;
The telephone numbers of all offices listed in paragraph (2) of this subsection;
If the agency is a corporate entity, the entity’s Certificate of Good Standing as a corporation;
The name of the agency’s responsible party;
Any other information necessary to ensure compliance with the provisions of this chapter, as established by regulation; and
The initial licensure fee as established by regulation.
